On a 4x4 grid, swipe up, down, left, or right to merge tiles with the same number. The goal? Reach 2048 (but hey, you can keep going for even higher scores)! **How to play:** - Use arrow keys or WASD to move the tiles.

Content: - When two tiles with the same number collide, they merge into one. - After each move, a new 2 or 4 will randomly appear in an empty spot. - The game ends when there are no more moves left. ## ‚ú® Special Features ### 1. Undo Function - Made a wrong move? No worries! - Just hit the "Undo" button to go back one step. - You can undo as many times as you like, all the way back to the start. - Never let a slip of the finger ruin your game again! ### 2. Secret Cheat Mode - Enter the magic sequence: ‚Üê‚Üê‚Üí‚Üí ‚Üí‚Üí‚Üê‚Üê (left, left, right, right, right, right, left, left) - All tiles will magically turn into 128! - It‚Äôs an Easter egg, just for fun. - Pro tip: Cheating is fun, but don‚Äôt overdo it! üòâ ## üéØ Demo üéØ : [Play here](http://2048.765431.xyz/) ## üìÅ Project Structure

RowTranslations.translatedContent: ## üìÅ Estrutura do Projeto

Content:
```
2048/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ static/
‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ css/
```

Content:
**File Descriptions:**
- `2048.py`: Backend server written with Flask, handles game logic and API requests.
- `script.js`: Frontend game logic, including moves, animations, and special features.
- `styles.css`: Game styles, making sure everything looks nice and responsive.
- `index.html`: The main page that brings everything together.

## üöÄ Getting Started

**Method 1: Download Release**
1. Download the latest release.
2. Make sure you have Python 3.x installed.
3. Install dependencies: `pip install flask`
4. Run: `python 2048.py`
5. Open your browser and go to: [http://localhost:9969](http://localhost:9969)

**Method 2: Clone from GitHub**
Translation:
**Descri√ß√µes dos Arquivos:**
- `2048.py`: Servidor backend escrito com Flask, lida com a l√≥gica do jogo e requisi√ß√µes de API.
- `script.js`: L√≥gica do jogo no frontend, incluindo movimentos, anima√ß√µes e recursos especiais.
- `styles.css`: Estilos do jogo, garantindo que tudo fique bonito e responsivo.
- `index.html`: A p√°gina principal que integra todos os componentes.

## üöÄ Primeiros Passos

**M√©todo 1: Baixar Release**
1. Baixe a vers√£o mais recente.
2. Certifique-se de que o Python 3.x est√° instalado.
3. Instale as depend√™ncias: `pip install flask`
4. Execute: `python 2048.py`
5. Abra seu navegador e v√° para: [http://localhost:9969](http://localhost:9969)

**M√©todo 2: Clonar do GitHub**

Content:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/sz30/2048.git
cd 2048
pip install flask
python 2048.py
```
Translation:
```bash

cd 2048
pip install flask
python 2048.py
```

## üé® Customization

Want to make it your own? Tweak `styles.css` for a new look, or dive into `script.js` to change up the gameplay. All code is well-commented for easy hacking!
